laboratory_examinations.findings: WBC count of 18,700 cells/mm3 (39% polymorphonuclear cells and 6% bands), platelet count of 545,000 platelets/mm3, erythrocyte sedimentation rate (ESR) 130 mm/first hour.
Alanine aminotransferase level of 169 IU/L, aspartate aminotransferase level of 69 IU/L.
Positive for ceftriaxone-susceptible group D Salmonella species.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Blood culture was also positive for group D Salmonella species one week after completion of initial treatment and remained positive during subsequent episodes.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Negative at the end of treatment after pericardiocentesis.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Previous cultures were positive; however, later cultures were negative after treatment.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Normal complete blood cell count, normal immunoglobulin levels, normal complement components (C3 and C4), normal lymphocyte subpopulations, and negative PPD skin test.
IFN-g was not elevated after stimulation with IL-12 compared to controls.
